_header: That mantle the king to Wilfred lent
Bibliographic Ghosts: Durham, Durham University Library Cosin V.iv.2f. 32v: not in this MS; Cambridge UK, Gonville & Caius College 364/619f. 65va: not in this MS.
_description: A two-line tag in the Fasciculus morum translating a Latin summary of an exemplum

BodLauMis213.Transcription:
Þat mantel þe kyng to vlfrid lentWit hap hit come wit hap
                    hit wente

Bod187.Transcription:
The mantel þat þe kyng to wulfryde lentWith hap hyt com
                    & with haþ hyt wente

Bod410.Transcription:
þat mantel þe kyng to vlfryd lentwith hap it come with hap
                    it went

BodRawC670.Transcription:
Þat mantel þe kyng to Vlfride lenteWith hap hit come with
                    hap hit wente
BodRawC670.Editions:
Wenzel,  Siegfried. 
             Verses in Sermons: ‘Fasciculus morum’ and Its Middle
                English Poems.
         Cambridge, MA: Medieval Academy of America, 1978: 172.

CamGon71.Transcription:
þat mantell þat kyng to Wilfride lenteWith it come with
                    happe it went

CamStJohn159.Transcription:
Þat mantell þe kynge to wlfryde lenttWyt wyt hap itt come
                    wyt hape it went

EDU82.Transcription:
That mantell the kyng to vnfride lenttWhyth happ hit come wyth happ
                    hit wentt

Lincoln44.Transcription:
Þat mantel þe kynge to vlfride lenteWyþ hape hyt come
                    with hap hit wente

Spalding.Transcription:
the mantill þat þe kyng to Vlfrid lentWith happe it come
                    with happe it went

WorcF19.Transcription:
þat mantel þat kyng to Wilfrid lentOft haþ hit com oft
                    haþ hit went
